Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

i search about a character creation feature and i've not seen anything anonce... yet...  on that topic.

Why : 

with this feature, we could definitely build our dream Team, Role Play throw a complete story... Identify our own kerbal in multiplayer screenshot.

Feature : 

Custom name

Custom job (pilote, scientist, engineer, maybe custom one if possible...)

Custom level stupidity, bravery and optimism

change the default color for the space suit (or other clothes, wearing T-shirt, Trousers,  socks...)

Custom kerbal face with : different haircut, hair color, eyes (size,color and position)

Custom Skin  refer to 

 

sharing our new character with friend simply by a seed system. (a simple copy paste of a text)

have a kind of roster to backup your favorite kerbal

 

does this idea of your own kerbal character creation interested anyone ?

thanks for reading my post, see you 

Edited November 5, 2022 by toonsgy
probably something like this but maybe only in sandbox mode or in some cheat menu like ksp1

1 minute ago, Laikanaut said:

The only thing that made sense in KSP is having it in the cheat menu, because you are controlling the features of your applicants. From a realism perspective, it only makes sense to generate these randomly.

The bearing on gameplay is so negligible that there really isn't much of a reason to hide it in the cheats. The benefits of letting players give themselves a good representation in their save very much outweigh whatever non-existent cons there are to letting players customise their Kerbals in a normal no-cheats save.
